name: HJfod's Menu Animations Reborn
description: HJfod's menu animations mod from 2.1, ported to Geode!

classic-play-button-anim.name: Classic Play Button Animation
classic-play-button-anim.description: Use the original animation for the Play button (that big button at dead center of the screen).

reverse-side-menus.name: Reverse Side Menu Animation Order
reverse-side-menus.description: Switches from the default "bottom to top" animation order to "top to bottom" animation order.

add-replay-button.name: Add Replay Button
add-replay-button.description:
Adds a button to replay the animation.

## <c-ff0000>***__Yes, there's supposed to be a cooldown for the button. Don't act surprised over this intentional design choice.__***</c>

close-menu-delay.name: Close Menu Delay
close-menu-delay.description:
Adjust the delay for the close menu.

<cy>For closing the game more gracefully without having to wait for the animation to finish.</c>

animation-speed.name: Animation Speed
animation-speed.description:
<cl>Original idea suggested by CherryChip.</c>

If you were expecting a genuine explanation for this...

<cy>Fine, I suppose.</c>
Higher number = faster animation.
Lower number = Slower animation.

<c_>There, happy?</c>

animation-delay.name: Animation Delay
animation-delay.description: Adjust the amount of time before each animation starts.

animation-duration.name: Additional Animation Duration
animation-duration.description:
Adjust the amount of time each animation takes to finish.

<cy>This setting is best left to its default value, as visual quirks WILL happen if used irresponsibly.

Typically used to adjust the duration of each button's animation.</c>

queue-in-main-thread.name: Queue Animation in Main Thread
queue-in-main-thread.description:
<cy>[Advanced Option]</c> Queues the animation for one frame.

## <c-ff0000>***__BUTTONS ON THE MAIN MENU MAY FLICKER FOR A FRAME IF YOU HAVE A LOT OF MODS; DON'T ACT SURPRISED.__***</c>
